```{r}
accidents <- read_csv("/Users/bhoomikan/Documents/Sample_Projects_DS/US_Accidents_Prop_City_Street.csv")
```

```{r}
head(accidents,n=5)
str(accidents)
```


```{r}
dataframe_cleaned <- na.omit(accidents)
str(dataframe_cleaned)

dataframe_cleaned$city <- as.factor(dataframe_cleaned$City)
dataframe_cleaned$street <- as.factor(dataframe_cleaned$Street)
```
```{r}
fit1 <- lm(severity_prop ~ city,data=dataframe_cleaned)
summary(fit1)
```
